English.question: Which option is the correct spelling?
What do you call the object that tells time?
What is the past tense of 'run'?
Complete the sentence: 'If I _____ rich, I would travel the world.'
What is the plural form of 'mouse'?
Identify the correct usage of the present perfect tense:
options: I have seen that movie last year.
I saw that movie last year.

English.question: What does 'the pen is mightier than the sword' imply?
options: Writing is more effective than force.
English.answer: Writing is more effective than force.

English.question: Choose the sentence that correctly uses a semicolon:
options: I have a big test tomorrow; I can't go out tonight.
I have a big test tomorrow, I can't go out tonight.
I have a big test tomorrow I can't go out tonight.
I have a big test; tomorrow I can't go out tonight.
English.answer: I have a big test tomorrow; I can't go out tonight.
